typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	LoadDate as timestamp (currentUTC("Berlin"))
}
source(output(
		Product_SID as integer,
		LoadDate as timestamp,
		RecordSource as string,
		Product_ID as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> HubProducts
source(output(
		OrderID as integer,
		ProductID as integer,
		UnitPrice as decimal(19,4),
		Quantity as integer,
		Discount as float
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> OrderDetails
source(output(
		Order_SID as integer,
		Order_ID as integer,
		LoadDate as timestamp,
		RecordSource as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> HubOrders
HubProducts, OrderDetails join(Product_ID == ProductID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinHubProductsOrderDetails
HubOrders, OrderDetails join(Order_ID == OrderID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinHubOrdersOrderDetails
JoinHubOrdersOrderDetails select(mapColumn(
		Order_SID,
		Order_ID,
		LoadDate,
		RecordSource,
		OrderID,
		ProductID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> ReduceJoin2
JoinHubProductsOrderDetails, ReduceJoin2 join(OrderDetails@ProductID == ReduceJoin2@ProductID
	&& OrderDetails@OrderID == ReduceJoin2@OrderID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Verbinden1
Verbinden1 derive(LoadDate = $LoadDate,
		RecordSource = "Northwind") ~> AddLoadDateRecordSource
AddLoadDateRecordSource sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		Link_Order_Details_SID as integer,
		Product_SID as integer,
		Order_SID as integer,
		LoadDate as timestamp,
		RecordSource as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		Product_SID,
		Order_SID,
		LoadDate,
		RecordSource
	)) ~> DVLinkOrderDetails
